:dataSource.description: Data source, where the data will be rendered to the left column, except as specified in 'targetKeys'
:dataSource.description_zh: 数据源，其中的数据将会被渲染到左边一栏中，`targetKeys` 中指定的除外

:filterOption.description: Filter according to the search content, receive two parameters, 'inputValue' and 'option', when 'option' meets the filter conditions, it should return true, otherwise it should return false
:filterOption.description_zh: 根据搜索内容进行筛选，接收 `inputValue` `option` 两个参数，当 `option` 符合筛选条件时，应返回 true，反之则返回 false

:listStyle.description: Custom styles for two shuttle boxes
:listStyle.description_zh: 两个穿梭框的自定义样式

locale.default: { itemUnit: `项`, itemsUnit: `项`, searchPlaceholder: `请输入搜索内容` }
locale.type: { itemUnit: string; itemsUnit: string; searchPlaceholder: string; notFoundContent: ReactNode | ReactNode[]; }

oneWay.description: The presentation is in a one-way style

operations.description: Manipulate collections of copy, in order from top to bottom
operations.description_zh: 操作文案集合，顺序从上至下

:operationStyle.description: Custom style for the action bar

pagination.description: Using the pagination style, the custom render list is invalid
pagination.type: boolean | { pageSize: number, simple: boolean, showSizeChanger?: boolean, showLessItems?: boolean }
pagination.description_zh: 使用分页样式，自定义渲染列表下无效

:render.description: Each row of data renders a function with an input parameter of 'dataSource' and a return value of ReactElement. Or return a normal object where the 'label' field is ReactElement and the 'value' field is title
:render.description_zh: 每行数据渲染函数，该函数的入参为 `dataSource` 中的项，返回值为 ReactElement。或者返回一个普通对象，其中 `label` 字段为 ReactElement，`value` 字段为 title

:selectAllLabels.description: Customize the collection of top checkbox titles
:selectAllLabels.description_zh: 自定义顶部多选框标题的集合

:selectedKeys.description: Sets which items should be selected
:selectedKeys.description_zh: 设置哪些项应该被选中

showSearch.description: Whether or not to display a search box

showSelectAll.description: Whether to display the All check box

:targetKeys.description: A collection of keys that are displayed in the right-hand box for the data
:targetKeys.description_zh: 显示在右侧框数据的 key 集合

:titles.description: A collection of titles, in order from left to right
:titles.description_zh: 标题集合，顺序从左至右

events.name: oneWay
events.description: The presentation is in a one-way style

events.name: onChange
events.description: option to transfer the callback function when moving between the two columns
events.description_zh: 选项在两栏之间转移时的回调函数

events.name: onScroll
events.description: Callback function when the picklist scrolls
events.description_zh: 选项列表滚动时的回调函数

events.name: onSearch
events.description: A callback function when the contents of the search box are changed
events.description_zh: 搜索框内容时改变时的回调函数

events.name: onSelectChange
events.description: The callback function when the selected item changes
events.description_zh: 选中项发生改变时的回调函数
